course_title: ESL 510: Fundamentals of Graduate Writing I
course_description: Few skills will be as important to you as a graduate student and professional scholar as writing. ELSP 510 sets priorities for learning to help you build a solid foundation of writing standards, strategies, and skills to position yourself as a successful writer in the academic community. To be recognized as a member of an academic community, you must write purposefully and correctly, which requires effort. ELSP 510 emphasizes the importance of continuous practice, revising, and editing in developing this skill.
